title: How to Pull Off the "No Results" Google Prank

steps.title: Search
steps.content: Search for a popular search term. This could be anything from "linux" to "real estate". It doesn't have to be extremely popular, just common enough that there will be quite a few listings.

steps.title: Add &num=0 to the end of the URL in the URL box.
steps.content: Add &num=0 to the end of the URL in the URL box. This forces Google to limit the number of results, in this case, to 0. Using a negative number instead will also work.

steps.title: Show the URL to the person you want to prank.
steps.content: Show the URL to the person you want to prank. You can accomplish this in a variety of ways, including emailing them the link, or just showing them your computer screen. The person will likely be very surprised, and may call their friends over to see.

steps.title: Conduct a search
steps.content: Conduct a search for something if the people being pranked start to worry. Once you conduct a search in the search box, it will show all results normally and you can laugh at them.
